overview: A story of a married couple living a luxurious lifestyle and Dhiraj is a businessman who ends up into big loss. He has lost all his money and their finances take a nosedive into debt. With 7 days to repay the Money Dhiraj reaches out to an old friend who is one of the biggest business tycoons of India. She invites them over to her villa for dinner. She agreed to help Dhiraj but also made an Indecent Proposal that Dhiraj has to sleep with her. Neha silenced as Dhiraj does not hesitate to agree as it is just a matter of one-night and he knows this is an easy way out of the debt and to continue living a lavish life.
title: The Deal
